name: HUMAN RIGHTS PROTECTION COUNCIL OF INDIA
briefDescription: Human Rights Protection Council of India This organisation established in the year 2016 on September 12th.This Organisation works on Fundamental Human Rights.Orphanage,Education,Protection of women & Child,Medical,Environment and sastainable Developments,legal Awarness,legal support. This Organisation works on the Village Level to National Level. In these Levels our Chairman's and members of our Organisation will work for Human Rights
